original_title: Searching For Sasquatch 8: Enter Ohio Grassman
overview: Jason Kenzie joins the SheSquatchers and Chad Datema in the dark forests of Ohio to search for the elusive monster known as Grassman, a Bigfoot-like cryptid. They will spend the next 72 hours looking for evidence of the historical creature.
title: Searching For Sasquatch 8: Enter Ohio Grassman
